name: Alerts Module
description: Retrieves space weather alerts, watches and warnings

parameters.description: Which product ID you wish to retrieve. IF not set, defaults to all
If true, any **previous** related alerts will be nested within this item
If true, any **future** related alerts will be nested within this item

returns.description: The serial number of this alert
If this alert is a continuation of a previous alert, `parent_serial` will be the serial of the previous alert

returns.notes: The timezone and format of dates can be changed using [Format Options](/v2/formats)

returns.description: When this alert will expire. Not all alerts have an expiration, so this may be null
If `alerts.children` is `true`, contains related alerts, starting with the latest update, and going backwards
If `alerts.parents` is `true`, contains related alerts, starting with the first alert, and going forwards until no more continuations are found
